explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions using deep learning as a rapidly growing part of machine learning discipline.
explanations.deep learning: The study focuses on using deep learning in combination with physical models for wind farm generation forecast.
explanations.neural network: Gated Recurrent Units (GRUs) are a type of neural network, which is used in the proposed approach.
explanations.recurrent neural network: GRUs are a variant of recurrent neural networks (RNNs), which are mentioned in the title.
explanations.gated recurrent units: The title explicitly mentions using Gated Recurrent Units (GRUs) for wind farm generation forecast.
